home.about-text-1: I specialize in backend development with expertise in APIs and databases.
home.about-text-2: Skilled in modern frontend tools, I create seamless and minimal designs.

paragraphs.title: Hi there !
paragraphs.text: I'm Eren, a passionate software developer with a deep interest in computers and programming since childhood. My journey began in high school, where I honed my object-oriented programming skills and explored the intricacies of software development.

paragraphs.title: Career Growth
paragraphs.text: I started my career as a freelancer and was later hired by the company where I completed my internship. Over time, I expanded my expertise by developing robust backend systems and an iOS application using Swift. My focus has been on building scalable and efficient software solutions.

paragraphs.title: My Experience
paragraphs.text: I developed an internal file transfer cloud application for Teknosa İç ve Dış Ticaret A.Ş., one of Turkey's leading technology companies. Additionally, I published an application on the Play Store and built a custom tool from scratch for the company I work for. I also designed and implemented a paywall management system for mobile applications, optimizing monetization strategies.

hireme.title: Hire Me
hireme.headline: Let's make something amazing together.
hireme.name: Name
hireme.success_message: I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

projects.title: Teknosa Transfer Tool
projects.desc: The application used by Teknosa company to securely perform file transfers without using third-party software.

projects.title: Manas BI Tool
projects.desc: The company management website that handles the information of Manas company's applications and the management of paywall payment screens.

projects.title: Gappze BI Tool
projects.desc: The company management website that handles the information of Manas company's applications and the management of paywall payment screens.

projects.title: ArDraw Api & Admin panel
projects.desc: Content analysis and admin panel for the ArDraw iOS app currently available on the App Store.

projects.title: Speedometer iOS App
projects.desc: I developed the first version of the Speedometer iOS mobile application, currently live on the App Store, using Swift. I was responsible for both the UI design and the overall functionality.

projects.title: Fortunely iOS App Backend
projects.desc: The backend of the Fortunely mobile application, which enables personalized daily horoscopes, was fully developed by me using secure and scalable technologies.

projects.title: TEMSA Transfer Tool
projects.desc: The application used by Temsa company to securely perform file transfers without using third-party software.
